website_summaries.verdict: The overall feedback of people towards the Under Armour Charged Impulse is positive. This running shoe is considered as a solid option for daily runs and all-day activities. The lightness of the build, the breathability of the upper, and the responsiveness of the midsole have become the highlights of this product. On the other hand, the upper unit is criticized for irritating the skin and for not being dutifully secure.Fans of road running shoes that are for neutral foot pronation are the ones likely to enjoy the Charged Impulse.
pros: The lightweight structure of the Under Armour Charged Impulse is lauded by those who have tested it
Some consumers believe that the midsole is soft enough to welcome all-day wear
The responsive platform is appreciated by people who like a springy underfoot experience
A handful of runners claim that the upper unit is able to support the medial and lateral sides of the foot, resulting in a steady ride
The upper unit is deemed breathable by those who have worn this Under Armour running shoe
Purchasers have welcomed the flexible configuration of the midsole, stating that it allows them to transition smoothly through the gait cycle
cons: A few testers believe that the upper unit isn’t as form-fitting as perceived as the fabrics and overlays tended to put some pressure on the skin of the foot
The heel security is not efficient, according to a runner who experienced unintentional shoe removals

customer_reviews.title: The lightest, most comfortable running shoe I have ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put - you are NOT going to get a higher spec, higher performance running shoe for this kind of money! The Pros: The lightweight structure of the Under Armour Charged Impulse is FANTASTIC! Midsole is soft enough to welcome all-day wear. The responsive platform is appreciated by me, as I like a springy underfoot experience. The upper unit is definitely breathable. Overall, the Under Armour Charged Impulse is positive. VERY positive! This running shoe is considered as a solid option for daily runs, all-day activities and competition use! The lightness of the build, the breathability of the upper, and the responsiveness of the midsole have become the highlights of this product for me! The Cons: NONE!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M M J

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressed with these. Comfortable, breathable hard wearing (to a point). I've been using Nike/Adidas for years but prices have gone up and quality has gone down, not too mention the soles wear out pretty quick. Took a punt on these, fit perfectly, really comfy insoles, colour and design are spot on, grip level good. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Extremely lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. My first Under Armour shoes. Usually, I prefer to choose Nike or Adidas running shoes but this time I decided to go for these ones and they exceeded my expectations. My first positive reaction was about their weight. They're extremely lightweight, soft and offer great support to my feet. They also look great! Extremely comfortable for walking or running. Totally recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LD's

customer_reviews.title: Like slippers!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable it's like running in your favourite slippers! Well cushioned and breathable and a nice roomy forefoot; they're very light, too. The only minor complaint is the colour, they're not going to stay white for long but if that's not a big issue for you, or you always run in the dry, they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kb7

customer_reviews.title: Run with no heal pain
customer_reviews.text: What a unbelievable comforting runner..I have sore planter fasciitis and I don't feel that pain after my runs with these. My wife has now also bought a pair. Cushioned insole
customer_reviews.author: Eoin

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight, breathable, great quality, size 7 a bit tight, gave them to my partner , ordered size 7.5 for me , all round great product
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Ashbarry

customer_reviews.title: Slightly snug yet comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are slightly snug fitting compared with my Adidas trainers of the same size. They are very light and comfortable although I find that the laces are too short meaning I have them tied tighter than I would like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers I’ve had for running.
customer_reviews.text: Very Lightweight Perfect fit Comfiest running shoe I have owned. I run sub 17, 5k and these are perfect for fast runs. I have done a lot of 6-10 mile runs during lockdown. So there great for any distance in my opinion. For the money you can’t get any better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Under armour shoes are a great fit , they are well made top quality product. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Moneytree

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: For £50 these are probably the best running shoes you can get. They fit very well around my feet and have a soft insole making running or walking for long periods hurt less.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Strong, supple stylish
customer_reviews.text: I really love these trainers, fit perfect, had them one week and already feel better than any other trainers I have had. Very good value for money and would recommend strongly. Very stylish and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Craig massey

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable and build quality is great
customer_reviews.text: great pair of trainers for a great price recommend these to anyone wanting a day to day trainer that you can run in too.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: As good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Lightweight, cushioned and was able to go running in them immediately without breaking them in. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Symington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic running shoe for the price. Extremely comfortable and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Amanda Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfortable stylish shoes
customer_reviews.text: perfect shoe , stylish,very light and Very very comfortable... I recommend this product ,great shoes for great price !!
customer_reviews.author: Assaf benyamini

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice shoes. Very light and comfortable. I am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: vedat

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Impulse Competition Running Shoes
feature_bullets: Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight
NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility and cushioning
Material Composition: UPPER: 82% Textile,18% Synthetic~OUTSOLE: 100% Rubber
Lightweight, engineered mesh upper is extremely flexible and breathable, with strategic support where you need it for a fast, sleek look
¾ length bootie construction hugs the midfoot and forefoot, for a more secure, plush fit
Dual-layer Charged Cushioning midsole with minimal outsole rubber for the ultimate cushioned, flexible and lightweight ride
